title: Papa John's unveils their new San Antonio Spurs-inspired pizza box for the upcoming season

A new bar has been installed where a section of seats once was. Photo: Madalyn Mendoza Image 18 of 18 Papa John's unveils their new San Antonio Spurs-inspired pizza box for the upcoming season 1 / 18 Back to Gallery Papa John’s is unveiling a new Silver and Black-inspired pizza box for the upcoming season, because nothing beats cheesy goodness and the Spurs.
The new packaging was created to celebrate the three-year sponsorship renewal between the Spurs Organization and the pizza company, according to a press release. San Antonio artist Cruz Ortiz put his local touch on the “Go Spurs Go” large pizza box that fans will have a hard time tossing out after dinner.
RELATED: A new AT&T Center means new food choices to snack on at Spurs games
“San Antonio is known for its flashing thunderstorms, and of course the Spurs,” said Cruz Ortiz in the release, who is also the founder of Snake Hawk Press. “The inspiration for the new ‘Mucho Super Amazing’ Papa John’s pizza box came from the incredible electric feeling of living in a championship city.”
RELATED: San Antonio Spurs Danny Green, Boban Marjanovic teach Selfies 101
Fans can snatch up the box, which of course will be filled with pizza, throughout the Spurs’ season for the fan favorite “Spurs 50” deal on game day Wednesdays and all playoff days. Customers are asked to place orders online using the promo code: Spurs50.
The team has one more preseason game on Friday, Oct. 23 against the Houston Rockets before tipping off the regular season against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Oct. 28
mmendoza@mysa.com
Twitter: @MaddySkye
